comments.body: You'll need to write some tests that test that you do the right thing for RTL.

(see "stall" comment above): Consider a variant of this test where instead of calling `pump` each time, you call `pumpWidget` (calling `setupSimpleSegmentedControl` each time and passing the same durations as now). The two tests should have exactly the same expectations.

Okay yes, so that causes an issue because initState() runs each time pumpWidget is called. I'm a bit at a loss for how to fix this though - is there a way you know of to get the animations to run correctly?
